attributes.action: Ban the wearing of football shirts unless playing football.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Football shirts worn in the street are generally worn by fat men who have not got an athletic bone in their body.
They give this country a bad name, especially those travelling abroad, and the majority are nothing but yobs.
Unless the shirt is being worn on a designated football pitch by a person playing football, they should be banned. 
Those caught breaking this rule could be dealt with under the Fixed Penalty Scheme.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
